hackathon-description-text: SfunCube Solar Hackathon: Friday April 17 6:30-8:30p and Saturday April 18 8:00am-9:00pm

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Judge, Presidential Innovation Fellow at U.S Department of Energy
Mentor, Founder of Runway and Topline Incubator
Mentor, Senior Product Manager, Enphase Energy

hackathon-requirements: You can submit between 5:30 and 6pm on Saturday April 18th. Be sure to include the following:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How well does the application address the goals defined for this challenge?
How creative, innovative, interesting, and unique is the application in meeting contest requirements?
How well is the idea executed by the developer and how well is the app integrated with potential customers or systems?
Includes design, user functionality, graphics, typography, ease of use, and visual aesthetic
To what extent will the submission impact the solar industry?

hackathon-description-header: SfunCube's Solar Hackathon brings the Bay Area’s most hardcore developers, creative designers, and brilliant solar business minds together to accelerate solar adoption in the US and around the world
